name: Touche Pas À Mon Poisson
description:
We made a serious game for the Sogeti Games X Blue Game Jam. See how the actions of an average guy affects the oceans and the fish you control in 3 stealth, combat, exploration levels.

Made in under 36 hours, 90% of the things were made by us. We are happy with this much of a game for such a limited amount of time. Make sure to tell us how cute the main character is!
(GAME IS IN FRENCH)

Team:
Designer - Azmio de Villeneuve                                                                                                              Artist 3D - Sami Skouri & Lyss
Programmation - Younes Saoudi & Lyss
